message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer.  $150 is a bit high for me.  I'd be happy to pay $85 for the product. Let me know what you think.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand that $150 is a bit high for you, but I was thinking more along the lines of $135. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit, after all!
Alice, I appreciate you coming down a bit, but $135 is still more than I'm comfortable paying. How about we split the difference and I pay $110?

I understand that you're trying to get a good deal, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $110. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, but this time at $125. I'm hoping we can find a mutually beneficial price.
